articles.title: Aston Martin launches swan song V12 Vantage before going electric
articles.description: Aston Martin has released the final petrol-powered version of its V12 Vantage sports car, as the luxury carmaker prepares to launch its first fully electric vehicle in 2025.

articles.author: Isaac Nowroozi, Niki Burnside
articles.title: How a sports stadium became a federal election issue for Canberra
articles.description: It may be the national capital, but Canberra is woefully lacking when it comes to major sporting facilities. On this, everyone is agreed, with federal election candidates this week making clear that they would take it on as an election issue.

articles.title: Porsche is working on all-electric Macan and 718 vehicles — and its own charging network
articles.description: Porsche is building its own EV charging network in an effort to boost sales of plug-in cars. The company is also working on all-electric versions of its Macan crossover and 718 sports car.
